name: Chocolate Cake
steps: Mix all ingredients, pour into a baking pan, bake at 180°C for 30-35 minutes. Let it cool and serve.

name: Lemonade
steps: Squeeze lemons, mix juice with water and sugar. Serve chilled with ice cubes.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti. In a pan, cook onion, garlic, and beef, add tomato sauce, simmer for 15 min. Serve sauce over spaghetti.

name: Pancakes
steps: Mix all ingredients into a batter. Pour onto a hot pan and cook until golden brown on both sides. Serve with syrup or fruits.

name: Mango Smoothie
steps: Blend mango pieces with milk, honey, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Caesar Salad
steps: Grill the chicken. Toss lettuce with dressing, add croutons, parmesan, and sliced chicken. Serve chilled.

name: Tomato Soup
steps: Cook onions and garlic, add tomatoes and broth, simmer. Blend until smooth, add cream, serve hot.

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
steps: Butter bread slices, add cheese, grill until golden brown on both sides. Serve hot.

name: Fruit Salad
steps: Chop all fruits, mix with honey and lemon juice. Serve chilled.

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Saute onions, garlic, ginger, add chicken and spices. Add tomatoes and coconut milk, simmer until cooked. Serve with rice.

name: Veggie Stir Fry
steps: Heat oil, sauté garlic and ginger, add vegetables, stir fry. Add soy sauce, serve hot.

name: Banana Smoothie
steps: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Chocolate Milkshake
steps: Blend milk, chocolate syrup, and ice cream until smooth. Serve cold.

name: Omelette
steps: Beat eggs with milk, salt, and pepper. Pour into a pan with butter, add toppings, cook until set. Serve hot.

name: Strawberry Parfait
steps: Layer yogurt, strawberries, and granola in a glass. Drizzle with honey. Serve chilled.
